channel.title: Fun and Gains
channel.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
channel.itunes:summary: Fun & Gains will fuel your love for sweaty workouts, loving yourself through the process, and creating the strongest version of yourself mentally and physically. The Fun and Gains podcast is your weekly reminder that you aren't alone on your fitness journey & your motivation to keep going. Let the gains begin.

item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.description:
britt is back for a solo episode to get you out of your head & pick you up off of the ground if you've been knocked down in life. In order to grow, learn, or progress in anything, you’re going to fail along the way! Failure is never an end, it’s an opportunity and today’s episode is your reminder to try again & keep showing up. Britt shares a personal story about how you can truly do anything you set your mind to when you refuse to quit.

item.itunes:title: my fitness journey | pregnancy, postpartum & everything in between
item.title: my fitness journey | pregnancy, postpartum & everything in between
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.description:
This week Britt sits down for a long awaited episode about her fitness journey. Fitness isn't a before & after when it becomes a lifestyle. Our bodies are for life, and it’s not an end game, it’s a way of living. So, love yourself through the process, & take time to build yourself healthy habits now that you will use for the rest of your life. Each stage is beautiful, & our bodies are amazing.

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!

item.title: busting the biggest fitness myths for women with Sal Di Stefano // Mind Pump
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.description:
Pencil in this week's episode & grab a notepad— Britt is joined by Sal Di Stefano of MindPump (the #1 podcast world wide for science-based fitness information) to bust some of the biggest myths when it comes to women and weight lifting. Sal talks metabolism, hormones, getting toned, progressive overload, soreness, nutrition, muscle memory, life lessons, strength training at all ages & so much more.

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!

Raise your spoons & give a warm welcome to the one n' oatly, @TracesOats! In addition to his good vibes & viral recipes, Trace is bringing the fun & oatmeal gains to the podcast this week. The two reunite to chat about Oatmeal Boy's experience with becoming TikTok famous, burnout, creativity in the kitchen, cooking fails, high school sports & records, under-recovering & enjoying every moment.

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
today's episode is all about what to do on those days we are feeling unmotivated. motivation only takes us so far. then it is down to discipline, habits, and consistency. Britt shares her top tips on adding discipline and consistency in her life.

Timestamps

00:55 motivation comes & goes

2:50 discipline

3:20 fitness audiences

5:00 different/new life phases

5:10 the issue with ‘you-vs-you’ mentality

6:20 24-hours in a day

9:30 ~ DISCIPLINE ~

12:15 #1 SET REALISTIC GOALS

15:20 confidence is keeping promises

16:30 set goals when you are unmotivated

18:18 #2 PUT YOUR GOALS WHERE YOU CAN SEE THEM

19:13 #3 PRACTICE DAILY DILIGENCE

20:38 how to practice small acts of diligence

23:29 #4 SET A TIMER

25:03 know your strengths & weaknesses

26:48 rewards & little pep talks

27:50 #5 FORGIVE YOURSELF & MOVE FORWARD

29:50 ~ CONSISTENCY ~

30:42 #1 CONSISTENCY IS NOT PERFECTION

32:00 mistakes & bad days

33:15 am I the only one!?

33:50 find the good

35:16 #2 GET ENOUGH SLEEP

36:20 it all adds up

36:40 #3 REWARD YOURSELF

37:25 #4 GIVE YOURSELF TIME

38:46 #5 KEEP PROMISES TO YOURSELF

41:00 review of the week

item.itunes:title: GYM BROS TELL ALL with Darian & Bobby
item.title: GYM BROS TELL ALL with Darian & Bobby
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
It's the most dramatic episode in Fun & Gains history— gym bros tell all, is here! This week, Britt is joined by Darian (GOAT husband & father) and their good friend Bobby (fulltime gym bro & part time firefighter) to answer your deepest, darkest questions. The gentlemen share their thoughts on male body image, approaching your gym crush, gym rivals, grunts, choosing a spotter, attractive things girls do in the gym, sweat marks, staring & so much more.

item.title: nutrition 101: macros + micros // why nutrition matters + what it does for our health
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton

item.itunes:title: beginners guide to the gym // 29 gym tips with Darian & Britt
item.title: beginners guide to the gym // 29 gym tips with Darian & Britt
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
Grab your favorite leggings or 5-inch gym shorts & get ready to own 2022— today, britt & darian are sharing 29 tips that will set you up for success in the gym. Whether you are just beginning your fitness journey, or tuning up your game plan, this episode is for you. *Disclaimer: if followed correctly, this guide may or may not result in a year of serious fun & gains in the gym*


Timestamps

00:20 a warm welcome

00:48 gym tips

1:55 #1 - HAVE A PLAN

2:30 why/who having a plan can help

3:00 credible sources

4:30 #3 - FOCUS ON FORM

5:09 technique

5:40 core

6:30 #4 - DRINK YOUR WATER

7:17 #5 - INVEST IN A PERSONAL TRAINER

8:39 #6 - NO ONE IS ACTUALLY JUDGING YOU

9:13 #7 - MIND TO MUSCLE CONNECTION 

10:54 #8 - WEAR THE DANG SHORTS

11:50 #9 - WEAR OUTFITS YOU FEEL CONFIDENT IN

14:18 #11 - HAVING A WORKOUT BUDDY

17:29 #12 - FOOD IS FUEL

21:22 #13 - ASK IF YOU NEED HELP

23:12 *don’t try this at home*

23:33 #14 - TRACK YOUR PROGRESS

25:00 #15 - DON’T GIVE UP

26:00 #gymshark66

26:27 #16 - START WITH THE BASICS

26:36 #17 - DO NOT MISS A WARM UP

27:10 flexible muscles are strong muscles

27:54 #18 - THE BEST EXERCISE = THE ONE YOU WILL ACTUALLY DO

29:11 #19 - DON’T BE AFRAID TO FAIL

30:07 you don’t fail until you give up

31:02 #20 - FIND YOUR CORNER

31:47 #21 - MAKE A FIRE PLAYLIST

33:24 *britt’s important question*

34:20 #22 - JUST WALK IN

38:19 #23 - HEADPHONES & MUSIC

38:35 #24 - REST DAYS ARE IMPORTANT

39:14 #25 - DON’T LET ONE BAD DAY DISCOURAGE YOU

39:40 #26 - PATIENCE IS KEY

39:55 #27 - IF SOMETHING IS ACTUALLY HURTING YOU, STOP

42:20 #28 - EVERYONE STARTS SOMEWHERE

42:58 #29 - DO NOT COMPARE YOUR PROGRESS

46:49 *what darian wants you to go comment/share*

If you’re ready to chat workout splits, changing careers, ditching comparison, mental health, powerlifting, & breaking the mold then this is the episode for you.

item.itunes:title: 21 things i've learned in 2021
item.title: 21 things i've learned in 2021
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
whether this has been a year for the books, or you're pumped to turn the page to 2022— britt sits down to share 21 things she's learned in 2021. reflect, relax, and let's get some fun & gains in the new year!

Timestamps:

00:28 heart to heart on a hard year

2:30 #1 - learning that I was enough.

4:20 #2 -  small moments matter.

6:24 #3 - one night/day of over eating won’t ruin results.

7:31 #4 - taking 3-4 days off from the gym one week won’t ruin results.

9:50 #5 - don’t let other people get in your head.

13:01 #6 - meet new people and stay in touch with those you really vibe with

15:42 #7 - sacrifices are needed to see growth & change

17:15 #8 - life is more than what’s on the scale, or what size you wear.

17:45 #9 - get out of your head and get outside.

19:12 #10 - don’t be afraid to make big moves, even if it doesn’t make sense.

21:58 #11 - there is no such thing as failing, unless you give up.

24:30 #12- say no when you need to, and say yes when you need to.

24:57 #13 - have some good books to read at night.

26:30 #14 - stay off your phone first thing and don’t be on your phone last thing.

28:20 #15 - start something new.

29:00 #16 - you are doing better than you think.

31:19 #17 - have a gratitude journal.

33:09 #18 - don’t be afraid to mix things up with routines. 

34:36 #19 - make sure you have a solid routine (morning & night!)

36:02 #20 - take time to talk to loved ones and friends

37:10 #21 - ask for help when you need it. 

39:35 britt’s reminder for the holiday season 

39:50 which one spoke to you the most??


YouTube vids:

My fitness journey:
https://youtu.be/ulqafyeEKqk

Week of workouts:
https://youtu.be/sedCYV7Xknk

Meal plan & grocery shop w/ me:
https://youtu.be/ghwoSYej3eE

item.itunes:title: 5 fitness trends that need to die in 2021 // & 5 i'm bringing with me to 2022
item.title: 5 fitness trends that need to die in 2021 // & 5 i'm bringing with me to 2022
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
buckle your seatbelts & grab you're coldest pre-work beverage because today things are heating UP on the fun & gains podcast; britt is calling bs on 5 fitness trends that need to die in 2021 (she's also sharing 5 that she wants to take with her into the new year)


Timestamps:

00:30 fitness trends
1:30 britt's weekly recap
2:55 fitness trends that need to die in 2021 
3:00 part of britt’s why
3:20 sharing knowledge

3:55 Trend #1 - quick fixes

4:30 comparison is the thief of joy

6:40 keep going

7:20 make it a lifestyle

7:50 your body is for life

8:20 sustainable habits

9:00 documenting the journey

9:20 Trend #2 - health trends that are not healthy

10:00 they leave you hopeless

10:40 britt’s juice cleanse experience

11:30 the danger of juice cleanses

12:50 many fear tactics ignore science

13:55 a gluten-free *preface*

14:14 the gluten-free ~trend~

15:45 all food in moderation

16:52 Trend #3 - the trend of doing everything but exercise & focus on nutrition

17:00 consistency = results

17:20 invest in yourself 

18:20 Trend #4 - getting toned

18:23 muscles don’t ‘tone’

19:00 what ‘toned’ really is

19:30 getting ‘bulky’

21:00 preventative health

23:15 Trend #5 - you cannot spot reduce fat

23:50 specific exercises in specific areas

24:15 where this idea goes wrong

25:10 melting fat away 

25:35 compound lifts

25:45 we all have those ‘last spots’ 

26:15 we lose fat differently


27:40 5 things britt is bringing with her to the new year

28:16 Resolution #1- begin with ‘me’ & my mindset


29:30 Resolution #2- health 

30:30 prioritize sleep more

30:40 exercise & non-exercise activities

30:50 training & workout splits

31:10 focusing on hydration


31:25 Resolution #3 - remind myself of what I can control & let go of what I can’t

32:10 brain dump 


32:40 Resolution #4 - laugh more & document more

33:25 you need ‘you’ time

33:55 reaching burn out

34:40 stress can break you down


34:50 Resolution #5 - continue practicing gratitude

35:40 finding the good in every day

36:00 simple things


37:42 WRITE IN YOUR JUICY GYM STORIES

37:55 email us: hello@funandgainspodcast.com

39:30 go comment a fitness trend you’ve fallen for

38:40 go comment your New Years resolutions

item.itunes:title: 5 reasons you're not seeing results // progressive overload, nutrition & more
item.title: 5 reasons you're not seeing results // progressive overload, nutrition & more
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
If the fun & gains have been feeling non-existent in the gym, then this week's episode was made for Y O U. Britt is back with the what, why & how of progressive overload. Get ready to chat one-on-one about how to apply reps, sets, weight, rest, time under tension, nutrition & consistency for success.

*disclaimer: this solo episode has a 99.99% chance of getting you unstuck from a plateau, and may result in you making serious gains over the next 4 weeks*

Timestamps:

00:30 first F&G #solo show
00:36 5 reasons why you might not be seeing results
00:50 weekly recap
00:55 vinny’s birthday party
2:30 what to do when you’re hitting a plateau

2:50 tip #1 - PROGRESSIVE OVERLOAD
04:30 increase your weight
07:20 how to find the right weight for you
08:40 increase your reps
10:40 decrease your rest periods
12:10 do more work in the same amount of time
12:18 increasing your sets
13:55 increase your frequency
15:30 extending past technical failure

16:10 tip #2 - TIME UNDER TENSION
17:35 slow + controlled
18:12 breathing + movement pattern
18:35 pause squats
20:05 bicep curls

21:27 tip #3 - TRACK NUTRITION FOR EDUCATION
21:45 britt’s approach + learn about what you are consuming
25:43 tips to increase protein intake
26:55 meal ideas
28:35 how to meal plan

29:20 tip #4 - DO NOT CHEAT YOURSELF + FINISH ALL REPS
30:07 get back on the horse
30:37 keep your promises to yourself

31:07 tip #5 - STAY CONSISTENT
31:40 give it some time
31:55 don’t get mad if...
33:05 you will see growth

34:20 guidance, motivation + education
34:40 sending love
35:30 keep going
35:50 comment + DM the podcast

item.itunes:title: adapting to change & making new routines with savannah wright
item.title: adapting to change & making new routines with savannah wright
item.itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
item.itunes:summary:
Join Brittany as she sits down and chats with Savannah Wright. They talk about starting their fitness journey and how to adapt to a busy and changing life. They also discuss making new routines and being "new" to the gym. We also get a sneak peak into their morning and night routines. Movies & Cookies?! Sit back, relax and remember, you are not alone on this journey!
